description: The SVG 1.1 image format has several components that were excluded from SVG 2, such as fonts, alternate glyphs, and the xlink namespace.
description_html: The SVG 1.1 image format has several components that were excluded from SVG 2, such as fonts, alternate glyphs, and the xlink namespace.
name: SVG 1.1 (discouraged)

firefox.notes: Document fragments (including references to fragments in the current document) are not supported (see bug 455986).

firefox_android.notes: Document fragments (including references to fragments in the current document) are not supported (see bug 455986).

ie.notes: Before Internet Explorer 7, Internet Explorer incorrectly interprets clip: auto as clip: rect(auto, auto, auto, auto).

safari.notes: Safari incorrectly interprets clip: auto as clip: rect(auto, auto, auto, auto).

safari_ios.notes: Safari on iOS incorrectly interprets clip: auto as clip: rect(auto, auto, auto, auto).

webview_ios.notes: WebView on iOS incorrectly interprets clip: auto as clip: rect(auto, auto, auto, auto).
